# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and potential impact, we are confident it is worth every penny of its $1500000 value to you. We are offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $1400000. This represents an exclusive saving of $100000, making it a unique chance to acquire a high-value asset at a favorable rate. We look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your business growth and success. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,400,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,400,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
